name: Prince Of Persia (houssamChab)
description:
I Re-create the Prince Of Persia 1989 Game
The Prince is Locked in The Dungeon by the Royal Vizier Jaffar and our prince should find his way out and save the Princess
Controls: (WASD /Arrows) (Left.Right Shift,Z)Contact me:  https://www.facebook.com/houssam.chab.75
Note: This project is for non-Commercial use.
Originally created by Jordan Mechner.
